statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, permission_type, resource_id FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_type DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, p.permission_type FROM users u INNER JOIN permissions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.permission_type = 'admin';
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, p.permission_type FROM users u LEFT JOIN permissions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT permission_type FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_type DESC;
SELECT user_id, resource_id, permission_id FROM resource_access WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_roles;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_type LIKE '%read%';
SELECT user_roles.user_id, user_roles.role, permissions.permission_type FROM user_roles JOIN permissions ON user_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_roles.user_id, user_roles.role, permissions.permission_type FROM user_roles JOIN permissions ON user_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT user_id, role, permission_type FROM user_roles JOIN permissions ON user_id = permissions.permission_id JOIN resource_access ON user_roles.user_id = resource_access.user_id WHERE resource_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1 AND role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1 OR role_id = 2;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT p.permission_name FROM permissions p WHERE p.permission_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id < 5;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT u.username, COUNT(rp.permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY num_permissions DESC;
